title: The Fault in our Stars plot.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: #The guy and the girl, separated by cancer.

replies.body: I wish I could upvote this more than once

LOL the only "cancer" you see here is threw the eyes of the enemy team!  I played with a Yas and these 2 on my team and lets just say a Yas will love having these 2 on his team.  In team fights it was literally, knock up, Yas alt and our team 1 shotting the other team.  I actually LOL'd in that team fight as to how fast everyone died.  No joke, 1 combo from our team and the entire team including the tank was dead in ....5 seconds?

 GG comments followed.  On both sides.
